comment._content: Stage and movie actor b. Sep 22, 1875 Seattle, Washington, USA - d. Jan 16, 1968 Los Angeles, California, USA www.imdb.com/name/nm0692826/ ibdb.com/person.php?id=15900 www.nytimes.com/movies/person/57428/Guy-Bates-Post "Hawk-nosed character actor Guy Bates Post enjoyed a long and distinguished career on Broadway"
